body:
We have sent you a confirmation email.

### What happens next

We have sent your application to the Miscarriages of Justice team.

Once they have received your application, they will send you a confirmation with an application reference number.

If you want to send any other documents to support your application, you can email these to <mojas@justice.gov.uk>. You need to include the first and last name of the person applying in the email subject line.

### Sending supporting documents by post

You can also send any supporting documents by post to the following address:

Miscarriages of Justice team 
Criminal Justice Group  
Ministry of Justice   
3rd Floor, Post Point 3.52   
102 Petty France   
London   
SW1H 9AJ   

[What did you think of this form?](https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/YNL9JFG)
heading: Application sent
